summary: A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.
cast: Amr Waked|Emily Blunt|Catherine Steadman|Tom Mison|Ewan McGregor|Rachael Stirling|Kristin Scott Thomas|Tom Beard|Jill Baker|Conleth Hill|Alex Taylor-McDowall|Matilda White|Otto Farrant|Hamish Gray|Clive Wood|Nayef Rashed|Peter Wight|Waleed Akhtar|Steven Blake|Hugh Simon|James Cutting|Colin Kilkelly|Bern Collaço|Sami Karim|Jorge Leon Martinez|Chris Wilson
title: La pesca del salmón en Yemen
